name: Medieval Sorting
description:
Game submission for Insanity Jam 4! The seed was 94980943170 and the generated idea was "A medieval game where you help compartmentalism, and it's totally awesome!" (I had genre locked). It's pretty self explanatory, and definitely needs work (artwork/levels) but puzzles are HARD to design!

Basic gameplay strategy is to sort items into groups so that everything in a group has something in common

(Hint: click the listed items to see what else can be sorted!)
